name: uimark
author: Ivanica Gabriel
description:
Now you can acces your favorite bookmarks easy and fast from Bookmark UI.
Give your browser a cleaner look and hide the bookmark toolbar.
Use Bookmark UI whenever you want to access you're favorite Bookmarks.

Default : Press CTRL + Q to show/hide the panel.
Click on the left edge of the webpage to show the Bookmark panel when you need it (best for fullscreen mode).
To open the bookmark in new tab click it.
